texts.name: Wrlik
texts.biography: Wrlik was originally a shepherd in the pasture, her family had only a few eagle training skills, and after entering the Wild Valley, she became a fish in water. In the ancient books obtained by the people from the Beetle God Monument, there is a method of taming the shepherd Hippogriffs that is exactly the same as what Wrlik's family learned.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Hippogriffs or Great Hippogriffs by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Hippogriffs
